document_data.name: Old Logrin Stout
document_data.mainbody: '''Old Logrin Stout''' was a [[stout]] from the city of [[Velen]] in [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Description: The beverage had a robust taste.
document_data.History: As of the late 14{{th}}, Old Logrin Stout was offered by [[Morgan's Inn]] â€“ a large tavern and inn located in the city of [[Velen]]. [[Volothamp Geddarm]] mentioned the stout in his guide to the [[Lands of Intrigue]] as being preferred to the inn's sweet cordials.
